title: TCS ranks 46, Infosys at 74 in Kantar's most valuable brand report
description: TCS and Infosys, ranked 46th and 74th by Kantar, excel in digital-first strategies. Infosys, valued at $24.68 billion, emphasizes client trust and expertise in enterprise AI and cloud technologies, with brand ambassadors Rafael Nadal and Iga Świątek.
content: IT bellwether Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is the most valuable Indian brand, ranked 46th globally, followed by Infosys at number 74, according to Kantar BrandZ Most Valuable Global Brands report released on Wednesday.
